name: The Notion Twitter Thread Planner
description: Want to cut your twitter thread writing time in HALF?I use this Twitter Thread Planner to write, plan, and edit my threads directly inside Notion.Not only does it cut my thread writing time in half, but it makes it MUCH easier to format and edit my threads before posting them.With This Template, You Can:✅ Draft Twitter threads directly in Notion✅ See your character count for each tweet✅ Organize your tweets inside the thread✅ Move tweets around for better content flow✅ Generate a new thread plan
